title: ntn.status Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response showing current status of Notecard's connection to paired Starnote.

err.description: This member is present if any errors have occurred while connecting to a paired Starnote, for example: `{"err":"no NTN module is connected {no-ntn-module}"}`

status.description: Details about a Notecard's connection to a paired Starnote, for example: `{"status":"{ntn-idle}{ntn-unknown-location}"}`

samples.title: Starnote Idle Status
samples.description: Response showing Starnote connection in idle state.

samples.title: Starnote Connection Error
samples.description: Response showing error when no NTN module is connected.

samples.title: Starnote Status with Location Info
samples.description: Response showing detailed status including location information.
